document.title: Class View and Object Browser Features

paragraph.paragraph: Feature Folders are visible from expanding a classes.xmlClass Folder or expanding one of the subfolders under an expanded feature folder. There are many different types of ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlfeature in Eiffel; for a full glossary of the features and their associated icon representation in the index.xmlClass View and ../object_browser/index.xmlObject Browser please refer to the ../icon_glossary.xmlClass View and Object Browser Icons documentation.

If you do not already know what a ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlfeature is in Eiffel, please refer to the ../../../eiffel_for_dotnet/index.xmlEiffel for .NET Language documentation.
Expanding a feature folder displays statuary information on the feature and its use within the project. The display items are listed below:

Ancestor version
../images/feature/hier_feature_ancestors.ico
A flattened list of all redefined versions of the expanded feature.

Decedent version
../images/feature/hier_feature_descendents.ico
A flattened list of all descended versions of the expanded feature.

Callers
../images/feature/hier_feature_callers.ico
A flattened list of all features that in turn call the expanded feature.

Implementers
../images/feature/hier_feature_implementers.ico
When expanded, a flattened list of all homogeneous features will be displayed.

If you need to direct the ../../eiffel_editor/index.xmlEiffel Editor to any feature found in the index.xmlClass View, a double-left mouse click on a corresponding feature folder will open the ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/20_language/10_eiffel_classes.xmlEiffel class in the editor and move the feature into view. Note: The index.xmlClass View will show .NET types when using the facilities to browse classes.xmlclass and feature ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlancestors, ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmldescendents, etc. Attempts to locate the related source will instead open the ../object_browser/index.xmlObject Browser and locate the appropriate folder given the assembly, type and feature.

When using the ../object_browser/index.xmlObject Browser, the Description pane will show the description, if available, for the highlighted feature in the Members pane. The description will also show any obsolete messages and any preconditions and postconditions applied to the ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlfeature.
